program main
implicit none

integer :: n, p, k0, k1, i
integer(8) :: ans, add

read(*,*) n, p

k0 = 0
k1 = 0
do i = 1, n
    integer :: x
    read(*,*) x
    if (mod(x,2) == 1) then
        k1 = k1 +1
    else
        k0 = k0 +1
    end if
end do

ans = 1
ans = ans * (2_8**k0)

if (p == 0) then
    add = 0
    do i = 0, k1, 2
        add = add + bin(i, k1)
    end do
else
    add = 0
    do i = 1, k1, 2
        add = add + bin(i, k1)
    end do
end if

ans = ans * add

print*, ans

contains

    ! Function to calculate binomial coefficient "m choose k"
    integer(8) function bin(k, m) result(res)
    integer, intent(in) :: k, m
    integer :: i
    integer(8) :: temp = 1_8
    do i = 1, k
        temp = temp * (m - k + i)
    end do
    do i = 1, k
        temp = temp / i
    end do
    res = temp
    end function bin

end program main
